full_text:
DISCRIMINATION AGAINST NON-STUDENTS.

	Nothing contained in this article shall be construed to authorize any landlord to discriminate against any person on the basis of the fact that the person is not a student.

1.name: Prohibition Against Discrimination Based On Student Status
1.label: article

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

DISCRIMINATION AGAINST NON-STUDENTS. (§ 45.63)

  DISCRIMINATION AGAINST NON-STUDENTS.	Nothing contained in this article shall
be construed to authorize any landlord to discriminate against any person on the
basis of the fact that the person is not a student.

Nothing contained in this article shall be construed to authorize any landlord to discriminate against any person on the basis of the fact that the person is not a student.
